articles.title: Gold Prices Shatter Records, Soaring Past $4,000 Per Ounce
articles.summary: **Gold** prices reached an unprecedented **$4,000** per ounce amid global economic uncertainty, marking the largest rally since the **1970s**. The precious metal has surged approximately one-third since **April** when President Trump announced new trade tariffs.

articles.summary: **North Korean** hackers have stolen more than **$2 billion** in cryptocurrency this year, according to **Elliptic**. The record-breaking amount, stemming from over **30 hacks**, surpasses their previous high of **$1.35 billion** in 2022.
